#summary How to setup various tools needed to run inspire-foss software
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The software from the inspire-foss project does not consist of an executable program. Rather there are various scripts and configurations that use from a variety Free and Open Source Software tools and components. This section lists the various tools required, with some guidance how to set things up.

== Core Tools ==

  * [http://java.sun.com Java], recent version 6 or higher
  * [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion] (SVN) client latest
  * [http://maven.apache.org Apache Maven2], a build/run tool
  * [http://ant.apache.org Apache Ant], a build/run tool (OPTIONAL)


== Transformation ==

  * [http://gdal.org GDAL/OGR with PROJ], 1.7.3 or better
  * [http://http://xmlsoft.org/XSLT/xsltproc.html XSLTProc] latest
  * [http://www.gnu.org/software/libiconv/documentation/libiconv/iconv.1.html iconv], character conversion (OPTIONAL)

== Database ==

  * [http://postgres.org PostgreSQL], recent version 8.3 or higher
  * [http://refractions.postgis.net PostGIS], recent version

= Web Services =

  * [http://deegree.org deegree], latest, downloaded automatically
